languages.text: "Увы, судьба мастера плоти оставалась неизменной — провидцы чувствовали, как бьется его черное сердце, но сделать ничего не могли. Тогда же наши следопыты принялись вычислять координаты его логова, основываясь на показаниях мудрейших и землях, не тронутых выпущенными орудиями. И у них бы это получилось, не атакуй мон-кай наш флот".

traits.locale_text: "Увы, судьба мастера плоти оставалась неизменной — провидчы чувствовали, как бьется его черное сердце, но сделать ничего не могли. Тогда же наши следопыты принялись вычислять координаты его логова, основываясь на показаниях мудрейших и землях, не тронутых выпущенными орудиями. И у них бы это получилось, не атакуй мон-кай наш флот".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."
languages.original_text: "Увы, судьба мастера плоти оставалась неизменной — провидцы чувствовали, как бьется его черное сердце, но сделать ничего не могли. Тогда же наши следопыты принялись вычислять координаты его логова, основываясь на показаниях мудрейших и землях, не тронутых выпущенными орудиями. И у них бы это получилось, не атакуй мон-кай наш флот".

traits.locale_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the seers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. This is when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the Wise Ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded if the mon-keigh had not attacked our fleet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Por desgracia, el destino del maestro de la carne aún no se ha sellado; los videntes podían captar los latidos de su negro corazón, pero fueron incapaces de hacer nada. Fue entonces cuando nuestros exploradores comenzaron a deducir las coordenadas de su guarida basándose en las lecturas de los sabios y los territorios que habían escapado indemnes a los bombardeos. Y habrían tenido éxito si los mon-keigh no hubiesen atacado nuestra flota».
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, el destino del maestro de la carne aún no se ha sellado; los videntes podían captar los latidos de su negro corazón, pero fueron incapaces de hacer nada. Fue entonces cuando nuestros exploradores comenzaron a deducir las coordenadas de su guarida basándose en las lecturas de los sabios y los territorios que habían escapado indemnes a los bombardeos. Y habrían tenido éxito si los mon-keigh no hubiesen atacado nuestra flota».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “遗憾的是，血肉大师的命运依然没有改变。先知感觉到他的黑心依然在跳动，但却无能为力。之前，我们的游侠打算通过先知的预兆，以及尚未被炮火覆盖过的土地，推断出血肉大师巢穴的坐标。如果当时那群猴子没有对我们的舰队发起袭击的话，他们本可以推断出来。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，血肉之主的命运依然没有改变。先知感觉到他的黑心依然在跳动，但却无能为力。之前，我们的游侠打算通过先知的预兆，以及尚未被炮火覆盖过的土地，推断出血肉之主巢穴的坐标。如果当时那群猴子没有对我们的舰队发起袭击的话，他们本可以推断出来。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Hélas, le maître de la chair y a échappé ; nos Grands Prophètes percevaient toujours les battements de son cœur noir, mais restaient impuissants. C'est alors que nos rangers ont commencé à déduire les coordonnées de son repaire d'après les divinations des sages et le recensement des terres que nos armes avaient laissées indemnes. Ils auraient réussi si les mon-keigh n'avaient pas attaqué notre flotte. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: « Hélas, le maître de la chair y a échappé ; nos prophètes percevaient toujours les battements de son cœur noir, mais restaient impuissants. C'est alors que nos rangers ont commencé à déduire les coordonnées de son repaire d'après les divinations des sages et le recensement des terres que nos armes avaient laissées indemnes. Ils auraient réussi si les mon-keigh n'avaient pas attaqué notre flotte. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「残念だが、屍肉の主の運命は変わらぬままだ。先見司は彼の黒き心臓の鼓動を感じることができたが、何もすることができなかった。そこでレンジャーたちは、賢人たちの計測と、発射された武器に触れていない土地から、彼の隠れ家の座標を推測し始めた。そして、もしモン＝ケイが我々の艦隊を攻撃しなければ、彼らは成功していただろう」
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: 「残念だが、屍肉の主の運命は変わらぬままだ。先見司は彼の黒き心臓の鼓動を感じることができたが、何もすることができなかった。そこでレンジャーたちは、賢人たちの計測と、発射された武器に触れていない土地から、彼の隠れ家の座標を推測し始めた。そして、もしモン＝ケイが我々の艦隊を攻撃しなければ、彼らは成功していただろう」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Doch leider bleibt das Schicksal des Meisters des Fleisches unverändert. Die Runenpropheten konnten spüren, wie sein schwarzes Herz pocht, waren jedoch machtlos, etwas zu tun. Also haben unsere Jäger begonnen, die Koordinaten seines Verstecks schlusszufolgern, basierend auf den Lesungen der Weisen und darauf, welche Gebiete von den abgefeuerten Waffen verschont geblieben sind. Und sie hätten ihn gefunden, wenn die Chem-Pan-Sey unsere Flotte nicht angegriffen hätten."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: "Doch leider bleibt das Schicksal des Meisters des Fleisches unverändert. Die Seher konnten spüren, wie sein schwarzes Herz pocht, waren jedoch machtlos, etwas zu tun. Also haben unsere Jäger begonnen, die Koordinaten seines Verstecks schlusszufolgern, basierend auf den Lesungen der Weisen und darauf, welche Gebiete von den abgefeuerten Waffen verschont geblieben sind. Und sie hätten ihn gefunden, wenn die Chem-Pan-Sey unsere Flotte nicht angegriffen hätten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki et üstadının akıbeti değişmedi. Ötesezenler, onun o kara yüreğinin atışını sezebilse de hiçbir şey yapamayacak kadar güçsüzlerdi. İşte o vakit korucularımız, bilge olanların kehanetlerine dayanarak ininin ve ateşlenen silahların dokunamadığı toprakların koordinatlarını çıkarmaya başladı. Mon-keighler filomuza saldırmasaydı başarılı olacaklardı da."
languages.original_text: "Alas, the fate of the master of flesh remained unchanged — the Farseers could feel the beating of his black heart but were powerless to do anything. That was when our rangers began to deduce the coordinates of his lair based on the readings of the wise ones and the lands untouched by the fired weapons. And they would have succeeded had the mon-keigh not attacked our fleet."

traits.locale_text: "Ne yazık ki et üstadının akıbeti değişmedi. Ötesezenler, onun o kara yüreğinin atışını sezebilseler de hiçbir şey yapamayacak kadar güçsüzlerdi. İşte o vakit korucularımız, bilge olanların kehanetlerine dayanarak ininin ve ateşlenen silahların dokunamadığı toprakların koordinatlarını çıkarmaya başladılar. Mon-keighler filomuza saldırmasaydı başarılı olacaklardı da."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
